description: Modares Archaeological Research. [n. b. This is the first journal I have seen to use academia. edu as  a platform for all online content. I am unable to find another location for the journal]. Semiannual Journal of Archaeology, Art History and Interdisciplinary Studies Journal of Scientific Union of Archeology University of Tarbiat Modares (TMU) Editor-in-Chief: Shokouh Khosravi. Adviser Board: Sajjad Alibaigi, Saeed Amirhajloo, Meisam Nikzad, Mousa Sabzi Do’abi, Sara Saghaee. Address: Scientific Union of Archaeology, Faculty of Humanities, University of Tarbiat Modares (TMU), Chamran Highway with Al-Ahmad  Crossroads, Tehran, Iran.
title: Modares Archaeological Research
